thread.title: ACI's Leverage Concierge Acquires dock3
thread.title_full: ACI's Leverage Concierge Acquires dock3 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: ACI's Leverage Concierge Acquires dock3
text:
Purchase unites complementary businesses to create unparalleled network of discount programs, high-touch onsite services and comprehensive concierge resources.
(PRWEB) September 23, 2015
Leverage Concierge, a division of ACI Specialty Benefits , today announced that it has signed a definitive agreement to acquire dock3 , a privately owned company that provides concierge services to organizations nationwide, including Good Samaritan Hospital, Land O'Lakes, Inc. and General Electric.
Dr. Ann D. Clark, founder and CEO of ACI Specialty Benefits, says, "Leverage Concierge is the fastest-growing division of ACI Specialty Benefits, and this important acquisition of dock3 further strengthens Leverage Concierge's position as a leading global corporate concierge provider."
The acquisition of dock3 unites two highly complementary businesses to create an unparalleled network of discount programs, high-touch onsite services and comprehensive corporate concierge resources. ACI's experience, scope of services and industry-leading technology will provide increased support and new benefits services to dock3 clientele.
"ACI's Leverage Concierge division is passionate about delivering highly customized and technology-driven workforce solutions that help organizations strengthen retention and recruitment strategies, and ultimately improve the quality of life for today's employees," adds Dr. Clark.
About Leverage Concierge, a division of ACI Specialty Benefits
Leverage Concierge is a division of ACI Specialty Benefits that provides corporate concierge programs to organizations worldwide. ACI Specialty Benefits is a global benefits provider of Employee Assistance Programs, Wellness, Concierge, Work/Life and Student Assistance services. ACI consistently ranks in the nation's Top Ten EAPs and has received widespread industry recognition including Best Places to Work, Healthiest Companies and Women Who Mean Business awards. Founded in 1983, ACI has grown to international prominence, with seven million lives covered worldwide and a network of over 52,000 providers. ACI remains a privately owned corporation headquartered in San Diego. Learn more about ACI Specialty Benefits at http://www.acispecialtybenefits.com .
For press inquiries, contact Laura McDermott at lmcdermott(at)acispecialtybenefits(dot)com
